solver.variables.delta

Interface IIntervalDelta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDelta, IntDelta, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntervalDelta, NoDelta

    public interface IIntervalDelta
extends IntDelta
    Interface for delta bounded dedicated to integer variable
    Since:
    11/01/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(int lb, int ub, ICause cause)
      Adds a new value interval to the delta

      Return the lower bound of idx^th interval stored in the delta, if any

      Return the upper bound idx^th interval stored in the delta, if any

       int ub,
       ICause cause)
        Adds a new value interval to the delta
        Parameters:

        ub - upper bound of removed interval
        cause - of the removal

      • getLB

        int getLB(int idx)
          throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Return the lower bound of idx^th interval stored in the delta, if any
        Parameters:
        idx - rank of the interval
        Returns:
        idx^th interval
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if idx is out of the bounds

        Returns:
        idx^th interval
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if idx is out of the bounds
